# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Librarian [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Librarian is responsible for looking after the library on the station. They can do this by organizing books and keeping records of check-outs. They also usually organise game sessions for the crew, like board games and tabletop RPGs.
## Do - Look after the library. - Organize game sessions for the crew.
## Don't - Shout in the Library.
